span.span: The result returned by the activity.

summary.span: 使用在 方法中定義的命令式行為建立自訂活動的抽象類別，會授予變數、引數解析和擴充功能存取權。

span.span: An abstract class for creating a custom activity with imperative behavior defined in the method, giving access to variable and argument resolution and extensions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 衍生類別可以定義在類別的型別規範中所指定之型別的結果值。Derived classes can define a result value of the type specified in the type specifier of the class. ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何從 衍生類別。The following example shows how to derive a class from . span.span: Creates and validates a description of the activity’s arguments, variables, child activities, and activity delegates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自訂活動作者可以在活動的 覆寫中提供驗證邏輯。Custom activity authors can provide validation logic in an activity's override. 從 擲回的任何例外狀況都不會被視為驗證錯誤。Any exceptions that are thrown from are not treated as validation errors. 這些例外狀況會從 的呼叫中逸出，而且必須由呼叫端處理。These exceptions will escape from the call to and must be handled by the caller.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 工作流程執行階段會使用 的預設實作，以確保工作流程的正確結構以及管理執行階段關聯性和存留期規則。The workflow runtime uses the default implementation of to ensure correct construction of a workflow as well as to manage run-time relationships and lifetime rules. 的預設實作會使用型別的 檢查活動型別的公用成員。The default implementation of examines the public members of the activity type using the type’s . 這些公用成員是型別， ， [IEnumerable\<變數 >](xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601)， ， [IEnumerable\<活動 >](xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601)，或.These public members are of type , , [IEnumerable\](xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601), , [IEnumerable\](xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601), or . 您可以覆寫這個方法，以自訂活動之執行階段描述的建置，並提供自訂驗證邏輯。You can override this method to customize the building of the activity’s run-time description and to provide custom validation logic. 從 擲回的任何例外狀況都不會被視為驗證錯誤。Any exceptions that are thrown from are not treated as validation errors. 這些例外狀況會從 的呼叫中逸出，而且必須由呼叫端處理。These exceptions will escape from the call to and must be handled by the caller.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 為此屬性設定值會傳回 .Setting a value for this property returns a . 不允許將執行邏輯定義為活動。 does not allow defining the execution logic as an activity. 反之，必須在 方法中定義執行邏輯。Instead the execution logic must be defined in the method.
